name: Life of Pepe
description:
A survival exploration game designed to be played with one or two players. Add and drop a second player at any time!



An army of grumlings has overrun the land, team up with a friend to fight back the invasion across eight distinct worlds. Coordination and preparation are keys to success and survival. A non-linear, sandbox approach allows players to forge their own paths and find creative solutions to challenges.



- Gather resources to survive and thrive
- Craft tools and weapons
- Build and furnish a homestead
- Battle hoards of enemies and brutal bosses
- Cultivate and farm plants and mushrooms
- Tame and ride animal companions
- Discover hidden secrets and unravel mysteries
- Meet an eclectic cast of characters
- Enjoy a unique soundtrack in each different world
